name: Avenger Sharks
description:
Avenger Sharks is a retro twin-stick shooter. Featuring sharks. OUT FOR VENGEANCE!

Your fishy friends have been kidnapped (fish-napped?) by evil forces. Battle wave after wave of enemies as you fight to rescue them. Increase your chances by collecting power-ups, health potions and UPGRADES as you progress. Invoke FISH FRENZY as needed to even the odds, as well as any trusty friends you find along the way. These friends include a dinosaur. Why? Because we wanted to have a dinosaur in the game.
